name: Add and Update Omnisend contacts by specific criteria to a Google Spreadsheets
description: Every time when you search Omnisend contacts by specify criteria, Make will automatically add that contact to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet or update an existing row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1NqSt1Ho-peSB_MMB1CniHbII1U19eRHOlmyE_31uj6k/edit?usp=sharing).
